item.description:
JOIN US for this once-a-year extravaganza with Robyn Vogel of Sacred Tantric Fire, Brynn Bishop of Tantric Intimacy, and Penny Gold of Source Tantra Yoga!

**********************************************************************

 

Sex Magic:  Manifest YOUR Deepest Desires!

 

 

Join us for this powerful evening!  Awaken your senses, set your intention for 2013 and we'll support you in super charging them with juicy sexual energy that will help you manifest your deepest desires!

 

This special evening, co-facilitated by Robyn, Brynn and Penny, will include an array of wonderful moments:  from Tantra practices including breathwork, movement and meditation to time to dance, mingle and connect with others in your local Tantra community.

 

Get ready for sensual experiences that will ignite your intentions for 2013 and bring you into complete alignment with your highest and best Self.

 

***OPTIONAL:  Feel free to bring food to delight the senses; along with materials and textures to share with each other through the evening.

***Please note this workshop is $30 if you pay in advance (use PayPal with this email address: core.empowerment@gmail.com) or $40 at the door.  Space is limited (and we expect this will be a huge celebration!) so please RSVP NOW!

 

Love and blessings always!!!
item.name: New Year's Triple Goddess Tantra Blast-Off!
